gameDetails.name: Summoner Wars (Second Edition): Wayfarers Faction Deck
gameDetails.description: Embark on an adventure across Itharia with the Wayfarers! This eclectic band of travelers have an endless appetite for adventure, and will follow their leader Celeste to the ends of the earth if it means gaining another tale to tell. Slip past your adversaries, confound them with performing arts, and make your way to new horizons! So pack your bags and join Celeste for a journey like no other!
